segments.text: Hi , Robert . What happened to your face ? It looks swollen .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I had to go get a cavity filled today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't even wanna talk about it . It killed me !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long were you in the chair ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It took quite a while , but the worst part was getting numbed . They had to give me 3 shoots .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I guess you've learned a good lesson , huh . You have to take good care of your teeth .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No kidding . Not only can â€™ t I stand the pain , but man ... dentists are expensive . The bill is going to be humungous !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't you have a dental insurance ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I do , but it still does not cover everything .
segments.speaker: S2
